class.name: NonNegativeConstraint

javadoc.text: A constraint for a linear optimization problem indicating whether all * variables must be restricted to non-negative values.
Whether the variables are all positive.

javadoc.param: restricted If {@code true}, all the variables must be positive.

javadoc.text: Indicates whether all the variables must be restricted to non-negative * values.
javadoc.return: {@code true} if all the variables must be positive.
